glsa.title: D-Bus: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: An error condition can cause D-Bus to crash.

background.p: D-Bus is a daemon providing a framework for applications to communicate with one another.

description.p: schelte reported that the dbus_signature_validate() function can trigger a failed assertion when processing a message containing a malformed signature.

impact.p: A local user could send a specially crafted message to the D-Bus daemon, leading to a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All D-Bus users should upgrade to the latest version:
